Package model

Class Request

java.lang.Object
model.Request
Direct Known Subclasses:
FacultyToFYPCoor, StudentToFYPCoor, StudentToSupervisor
public abstract class Request extends Object
Represents a request in the FYP Portal.
Since:
2023-04-15
Version:
1.0

  • Constructor Details

    • Request

      public Request(int projectID, String Status, Boolean isViewed)
      Creates a new Request.
      Parameters:
      projectID - The project ID of the project under this request.
      Status - The status of this request. It is set to PENDING by default.
      isViewed - The status of whether this request has been viewed by the intended recipient.

  • Method Details

    • getisViewed

      public boolean getisViewed()
      Gets the status of whether this Request has been viewed by the intended recipient.
      Returns:
      The viewed status of this request.

    • setViewed

      public void setViewed(boolean viewed)
      Changes the status of whether this Request has been viewed by the intended recipient.
      Parameters:
      viewed - The new viewed status of this request.

    • getRequestedProjectID

      public int getRequestedProjectID()
      Gets the project ID of the project under this Request.
      Returns:
      The project ID of the requested project.

    • getRequestStatus

      public RequestStatus getRequestStatus()
      Gets the status of this Request. It is either PENDING, APPROVED or REJECTED.
      Returns:
      The status of this request.

    • setRequestStatus

      public RequestStatus setRequestStatus(RequestStatus newStatus)
      Changes the status of this Request.
      Parameters:
      newStatus - The new status of this request.
      Returns:
      The new status of this request.

    • getRequestType

      public RequestType getRequestType()
      Gets the type of Request being made.
      Returns:
      The type of request.

    • setRequestType

      public void setRequestType(RequestType requestType)
      Changes the type of Request being made.
      Parameters:
      requestType - The new request type.

    • getRequestID

      public int getRequestID()
      Gets the request ID of this Request.
      Returns:
      The request ID of this request.

    • getCreator

      public abstract User getCreator()
      Gets the User who created this Request.
      Returns:
      The creator of this request.

    • toHashMap

      public abstract HashMap<String,Object> toHashMap()
      Creates a map containing this Request's details.
      Returns:
      The map containing this request's details.
